channel.title: Comments on: Grab Your Foil Hats!

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Yeah, we all know that cheaters and Blizzard go together like peanut butter and jelly (time!), but I'm very much inclined to believe that their sweep this time came up with a good handful of false positives. Blizzard is still made up of humans, and humans are falliable.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, we all know that cheaters and Blizzard go together like peanut butter and jelly (time!), but I’m very much inclined to believe that their sweep this time came up with a good handful of false positives. Blizzard is still made up of humans, and humans are falliable.
